Class PcapAddr

java.lang.Object
  org.jnetpcap.PcapAddr

public final class PcapAddr
extends java.lang.Object

Class peered with native pcap_addr structure. Holds pcap addresses.

Author:
Mark Bednarczyk, Sly Technologies, Inc.
